tswitem.name: Salubrious Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Salubrious Augment Resonator
An unattuned support augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will give your team a beneficial effect that heals once for 20/ 40/ 60/ 80/ 100 and increases healing done by 2%/ 3%/ 5%/ 6%/ 7% for 5 seconds when you activate this ability. This can only happen every 30 seconds.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 3 Attuned Curing Augment Resonators
  • 96 Pure metal
